mapper.insert: insert into sequences (sequence_catalog, sequence_schema, sequence_name, data_type, numeric_precision, numeric_precision_radix, numeric_scale, start_value, minimum_value, maximum_value, `increment`, cycle_option) values (#{sequenceCatalog,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{sequenceSchema,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{sequenceName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{dataType,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{numericPrecision,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{numericPrecisionRadix,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{numericScale,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{startValue,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{minimumValue,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{maximumValue,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{increment,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{cycleOption,jdbcType=DISTINCT})
mapper.select: select sequence_catalog, sequence_schema, sequence_name, data_type, numeric_precision, numeric_precision_radix, numeric_scale, start_value, minimum_value, maximum_value, `increment`, cycle_option from sequences
